hymn.title: His banner over me is love

layout.singingstanza: His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love, His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love; He brought me in -- to His ban -- quet -- ing house, And His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love. Is love! Is love! His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love; He brought me in -- to His ban -- quet -- ing house, And His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love.

lyrics.stanza: His banner over me is love, His banner over me is love; He brought me into His banqueting house, And His banner over me is love.
Is love! Is love! His banner over me is love; He brought me into His banqueting house, And His banner over me is love.
His fruit is sweet unto my taste, His fruit is sweet unto my taste; I'm feasting here in His banqueting house, And His fruit is sweet unto my taste.
How sweet! How sweet! His fruit is sweet unto my taste; I'm feasting here in His banqueting house, And His fruit is sweet unto my taste.
